title: CYRILCOHEN.NET
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013104334im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/objetgraphique_accueil_3575.png)

Can anyone help me identify the large display type?

Seems slightly similar to Typ1451 Bold,  
 [http://www.lineto.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013104334/http:/www.lineto.com/ "http://www.lineto.com/")  
but the rounded characters are more refined  
in this version.

Thanks.

 [‹ Swiftlike serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013104334/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46710 "Go to previous forum topic") [Match font please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013104334/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46677 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jonathan McGlothin
